Bit.name: search cardinal direction lightmaps on failure
extension of parent
Bit.description: object passes all function values to parent and uses parent's markers

Bit.name: use static massive lightmap sample
Bit.description: cast A LOT of rays once and store the results for lighting

Bit.name: attach to clusters by dynamic sphere
Bit.description: use this for the mac gun on spacestation

Bit.name: effects created by this object do not spawn objects in multiplayer
prophet is not displayed in pegasus builds

Real.name: acceleration scale
Real.description: marine 1.0, grunt 1.4, elite 0.9, hunter 0.5, etc.

Real.name: dynamic light sphere radius
Real.description: sphere to use for dynamic lights and shadows. only used if not 0

Bit.name: invert
Bit.description: result of function is one minus actual result

Bit.name: mapping does not controls active
Bit.description: the curve mapping can make the function active/inactive

Bit.name: always active
Bit.description: function does not deactivate when at or below lower bound

Bit.name: random time offset
Bit.description: function offsets periodic function input by random value between 0 and 1

StringId.name: turn off with
StringId.description: if the specified function is off, so is this function

Real.name: min value
Real.description: function must exceed this value (after mapping) to be active 0. means do nothing

Explanation.name: Applying collision damage
Explanation.description: for things that want to cause more or less collision damage

Real.name: Apply collision damage scale
Real.description: 0 means 1. 1 is standard scale. Some things may want to apply more damage

Explanation.name: Game collision damage parameters
Explanation.description: 0 - means take default value from globals.globals

Explanation.name: Absolute collision damage parameters
Explanation.description: 0 - means take default value from globals.globals

StringId.name: variant name
StringId.description: if empty, may be used by any model variant

Bit.name: blend in hsv
Bit.description: blends colors in hsv rather than rgb space

Bit.name: ...more colors
Bit.description: blends colors through more hues (goes the long way around the color wheel)

Enum.name: after first bounce off any surface

Real.name: arming time
Real.description: won't detonate before this time elapses

Real.name: minimum velocity
Real.description: detonates when slowed below this velocity

Real.name: maximum range
Real.description: detonates after travelling this distance

Real.name: air gravity scale
Real.description: the proportion of normal gravity applied to the projectile when in air.

RealBounds.name: air damage range
RealBounds.description: the range over which damage is scaled when the projectile is in air.

Real.name: water gravity scale
Real.description: the proportion of normal gravity applied to the projectile when in water.

RealBounds.name: water damage range
RealBounds.description: the range over which damage is scaled when the projectile is in water.

Real.name: initial velocity
Real.description: bullet's velocity when inflicting maximum damage

Real.name: final velocity
Real.description: bullet's velocity when inflicting minimum damage

Explanation.name: default result
Explanation.description: (if the potential result, below, fails to happen)

Angle.name: angular noise
Angle.description: the angle of incidence is randomly perturbed by at most this amount to simulate irregularity.

Real.name: velocity noise
Real.description: the velocity is randomly perturbed by at most this amount to simulate irregularity.

Real.name: initial friction
Real.description: the fraction of the projectile's velocity lost on penetration

Real.name: maximum distance
Real.description: the maximum distance the projectile can travel through on object of this material

Real.name: parallel friction
Real.description: the fraction of the projectile's velocity parallel to the surface lost on impact

Real.name: perpendicular friction
Real.description: the fraction of the projectile's velocity perpendicular to the surface lost on impact

Real.name: minimum velocity
Real.description: detonates when slowed below this velocity

Real.name: maximum range

Real.name: material effect radius
Real.description: radius within we will generate material effects

Real.name: air gravity scale

Real.name: final velocity
Real.description: bullet's velocity when inflicting minimum damage

RealBounds.name: acceleration range
RealBounds.description: what distance range the projectile goes from initial velocity to final velocity

Explanation.name: default result
Explanation.description: (if the potential result, below, fails to happen)

Angle.name: angular noise
Angle.description: the angle of incidence is randomly perturbed by at most this amount to simulate irregularity.
